pr_title: [FLINK-18305][metrics][docs] Add example interval configuration to all supporting reporters

timeline.message: [FLINK-18304][metrics][docs] Add example interval configuration to all supporting reporters

timeline.bodyText: Is it not too long for most cases? Maybe 5-10 sec?
timeline.author: azagrebin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -646,6 +646,7 @@ metrics.reporter.grph.factory.class: org.apache.flink.metrics.graphite.GraphiteR
 metrics.reporter.grph.host: localhost
 metrics.reporter.grph.port: 2003
 metrics.reporter.grph.protocol: TCP
+metrics.reporter.grph.interval: 60 SECONDS
